title: casinodevservices
author: casinodevservices
content: Selling custom crypto casino + installation (not a premade script)Demo: on request (digby#9927 on discord)Price: $1500 (installation included + negotiable)Discord: digby#9927Site includes:    21 Original games (doesnt come with pragmatic play integration but I can add it)    Provably fair system (built in)    Player stats    Multiple chat rooms + languages    Fully gamified - gives the player a fun, interactive experience(free spins, levelling up etc)    Crypto deposit/withdrawal system.    Huge backend with the ability to control game outcomesMIDDLEMAN IS A MUST. WE WILL USE ANY TRUSTED BITCOINTALK MIDDLEMANPlease dm me on discord for questions/to order.

comments.author: casinodevservices
comments.body: Lowering price to 1k for the next 7 days - order now.

comments.author: swaga
comments.body: Seller is a huge time waster / not knowledgeable about any sort of dev work.What he does is outsource the work to people like me and then takes the cut from sales.Shame.Also he literally copied my sales thread - What he is selling is a free version of script I gave him out of pity.
